rdt.essentials

Class RDTInstances

  • java.lang.Object
    • rdt.essentials.RDTInstances

  • public class RDTInstances
extends java.lang.Object
    Class for RDTInstances. This class represents instances in the framework and it is build on the instances-class of the weka library. The only difference is that a RDTInstances can contain restricted attributes (attributes which are used in the collectors (e.g. the class-attribute for a classification task)).
    Author:
    MK

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      RDTInstances(weka.core.Instances insts, int[] restrictedAttributesIndex)
      Creates a new RDTInstances with the given instances of the weka library and the restricted attribute-ids (attribute-ids of the attributes which are used in the collectors).
      RDTInstances(weka.core.Instances insts, int[] restrictedAttributesIndex, java.lang.String path)
      Creates a new RDTInstances with the given instances of the weka library and the restricted attribute-ids (attribute-ids of the attributes which are used in the collectors).
      RDTInstances(weka.core.Instances insts, RDTAttribute[] attributes, RDTAttribute[] restrictedAttributes, RDTAttribute[] freeAttributes, java.lang.String path)
      Creates a new RDTInstances with the given instances of the weka library, the given information about the attributes.
      RDTInstances(java.lang.String path, int[] restrictedAttributesIndex)
      Creates a new RDTInstances with the instances which will be read from the file which is given by the path and the restricted attribute-ids (attribute-ids of the attributes which are used in the collectors).

    • Constructor Detail

      • RDTInstances

        public RDTInstances(java.lang.String path,
                    int[] restrictedAttributesIndex)
             throws java.io.IOException,
                    RDTException
        Creates a new RDTInstances with the instances which will be read from the file which is given by the path and the restricted attribute-ids (attribute-ids of the attributes which are used in the collectors).
        Parameters:
        path - the location of the file from which the instances will be read
        restrictedAttributesIndex - the attribute-ids of the attributes which are restricted
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        RDTException

      • RDTInstances

        public RDTInstances(weka.core.Instances insts,
                    int[] restrictedAttributesIndex)
             throws java.io.IOException,
                    RDTException
        Creates a new RDTInstances with the given instances of the weka library and the restricted attribute-ids (attribute-ids of the attributes which are used in the collectors). By using this constructor the path will be set to null.
        Parameters:
        insts - the instances of the weka library
        restrictedAttributesIndex - the attribute-ids of the attributes which are restricted
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        RDTException

      • RDTInstances

        public RDTInstances(weka.core.Instances insts,
                    int[] restrictedAttributesIndex,
                    java.lang.String path)
             throws java.io.IOException,
                    RDTException
        Creates a new RDTInstances with the given instances of the weka library and the restricted attribute-ids (attribute-ids of the attributes which are used in the collectors). By using this constructor the path will be set to the given path.
        Parameters:
        insts - the instances of the weka library
        restrictedAttributesIndex - the attribute-ids of the attributes which are restricted
        path - the path to the file of which the instances have been read
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        RDTException

      • RDTInstances

        public RDTInstances(weka.core.Instances insts,
                    RDTAttribute[] attributes,
                    RDTAttribute[] restrictedAttributes,
                    RDTAttribute[] freeAttributes,
                    java.lang.String path)
             throws java.io.IOException,
                    RDTException
        Creates a new RDTInstances with the given instances of the weka library, the given information about the attributes. By using this constructor the path will be set to the given path.
        Parameters:
        insts - the instances of the weka library
        attributes - all attributes of the dataset
        restricted - the attribute-ids which are restricted (attributes are used in the collectors)
        freeAttributes - the attribute-ids which are not restricted (attributes are not used in the collectors)
        path - the path to the file of which the instances have been read
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        RDTException

      • addInstances

        public void addInstances(RDTInstances temp)
                  throws RDTException
        Combines the instances with the given instances. All the given instances will be added to this RDTInstances-instance. The attributes of both RDTInstances have to be the same otherwise an exception will be thrown.
        Parameters:
        temp, - the given instances
        Throws:
        RDTException
